scripts.add:
cd src/plugins && git clone https://github.com/LotharieSlayer/$npm_config_plugin && cd ../.. && echo "
 \033[32m Plugin $npm_config_plugin added successfully ! \033[0m 
"
scripts.remove:
cd src/plugins && rm -rf $npm_config_plugin && cd ../.. && echo "
 \033[32m Plugin $npm_config_plugin removed successfully ! \033[0m 
"
